scripts.build-all: npm run build-coin-compare && npm run build-movie-app && npm run build-cultural-event-info && mkdir -p build && cp -r react-masterclass/build build/coin-compare && cp -r movie-app/build build/movie-app && cp -r cultural-event-info/build build/cultural-event-info
scripts.build-coin-compare: (cd react-masterclass && npm install && npm run build)
scripts.build-movie-app: (cd movie-app && npm install && npm run build)
scripts.build-cultural-event-info: (cd cultural-event-info && npm install && npm run build)
